thumb.name: Letter to Santa
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3EStationery Instructions:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E1. To personalize and print this project, click on the preview image to the left to open the workspace.%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E2. Personalize the text and graphics. Select the text to change it or its size, color, and font. Even add digital photos!%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E3. Click on the Print button, select the number of copies you'd like to print and go!. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cb%3ETips:%3C/b%3E Print your stationery on plain paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E

thumb.name: Letter for Santa
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3EEnvelope Instructions:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E1. To personalize and print this project, click on the preview image to the left to open the workspace.%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E2. Personalize the text and graphics. Select the text to change it or its size, color, and font. Even add digital photos!%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E3. Click on the Print button, select the number of copies you'd like to print and go!. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cb%3ETips:%3C/b%3E Print your envelope on plain paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E

thumb.name: Christmas Wish List
thumb.verse: Be sure Santa knows what you want for Christmas this year by creating a fun Wish List!%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EYou'll need:%3C/B%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E Paper. 8 1/2 x 11 inches. %3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3COL%3E%3CLI%3EClick on %3CB%3EPersonalize Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Create %26 Print workspace. %3CBR%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3EPersonalize the text. Select the text to write over it or change size. color. and font style.%3Cbr%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3EFor additional list pages. click %3Cb%3EAdd Page%3C/b%3E and follow the directions. %3CBR%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EPrint%3C/b%3E your project. %3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3C/OL%3E%3C/LI%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your project on scrap paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. %3Cbr%3E
